#summary Summary of datacard module.

= Datacard module =

Yate channel driver for Huawei UMTS cards

==Routing==

Syntax: `datacard/callednumber;device=devicename`

The callednumber is, obvious, the called party's number. The device parameter is mandatory and indicates the device to use. devicename must be the name of an active device configured in detacard.conf.

===Examples===

`^555$=datacard/+380913012216;device=datacard0`
